title: A New approach to dental health
brief_description: Shows a multidisciplinary approach to the teaching of dental care in some English schools. Illustrates how reading, writing, mathematical and social skills, as well as knowledge of dental care, can be developed with this approach. Also notes parents’ reactions to this style of teaching.
